unnormalised: Bore, tumi loan gheuncheak sochtaat, hã? Paisa zai, maka samzaata! Loan ghevop ek vhoddlem paaul disonk xakta, punn aizkal hem chodd samanya zalaam. Tem Mumbai-antlem tumchem sopnanchem ghor aso di vo Delhi-nt tumchea chacha-chem veapaar vaddoouncheak aso di, loans ani repayment-achim niyamam zanna zaunk khoob mhotvachem. Aami tem follyaam, kiteak?
normalised: Boro, tum loan gheupacho vichar kortat, hã? Poixe zai mhonn mell’lle mhaka! Loan gheupak ek vhoddlem panvl gheupak poddta oxem dista, punn aizkal hem chodd sadaronn zalam. Mumbai-nt tem sopnachem ghor gheunk vo Delhi-nt tumchea chacha-cho dhondo vaddoik zai mhonn loanam ani porot korpak yeupi babdim zannovop khub mhotvachem. Teo foddun sangche, mhonnllear zalem?

unnormalised: Poilem vostu poilem, basics samzaat. Loan mhunnttlear ek bank (SBI vo HDFC sarkhi), vo dusri kosli tori arthik sansthaankodden than dovornn ghevnk, tanaka interest-an fattim dinvchen promise korun. Tem interest? Tem bankachem tumchea kodden than poisa kamavchenhem rit, basics-an. Mhunnttlear, shop karaat! Vegvegllya banks-an dilelim interest rates tulna karaat, lipovlelim fees sodhaat, ani poilem offer-ak uchchal maaka. Te tumak ek unnem rate dakoitlem, zaise 7.5%, punn processing fees khoob chodd zaunk xakta!
normalised: Poilem kitem te, mulbhut gajali somzonk gheiat. Loan mhonnllear mul’latvean bankantlean (S-B-I vo H-D-F-C bhaxen), vo her konnakui arthik sonstheankodden poixe udhar gheunk ani tem vyajacher porot dilem mhonn vapdaavop. Tem vyaj? Tem bankache poixe tumchea koddenlean kamanvk, mul’latvean. Tori, dukanaan bhomvat! Vegvegllea bankamni dil’lea vyajachea darananchi tulna korat, lipoilelea fees-ank sodat, ani poilem dilam tacher uchkil’lemnaka. Tankam tumkam eka unnea daranant uddo divnk zata, jem sat point panch tokke, punn process korpachi fees khub uchch zata!

unnormalised: Aata, vegveglle prakarache loans asa, dor ekak aaplicha niyamancha set asa. Ghorachem loan samanyatah ek vhoddlem, zaise Rs. 50 lakh vo Rs. 1 crore Bangalore sarkhya shaharant. Personal loans, dusre vatter, samanyatah unnem asta, kadchit Rs. 50,000 tem Rs. 5 lakh, ani tem kazar than daktari karchak koslea-i vostuk vaprunk zata. Magir education loans asa zalea tumchem bhurge IIT-ant B.Tech koronk sodta vo toslem koslench fancy. Dor ekak aaplichem interest rate ani repayment schedule asta.
normalised: Atam, vegvegllea toreanche loan asat, dor ekak aple toreche nem asat. Ghorachem loan sadaronnponnim vhoddlench asta, jem rupi panch lakh vo rupi ek crore bhaxen Bangalore bhaxen xheramni. Vyaktigat loan, dusre vatten, sadaronnponnim lhan asta, bodlek rupi panch hazar vo rupi panch lakh bhaxen, ani hem konnakui lagounk zata lognachea kharchantlean vo voizki kharchantleanchea lagim. Uprant xikpaache loan asta tumchem bhurgem B-Tech korunk I-I-T-nt vo kainch tori somanachem. Dor ekak aple toreche vyajachem dar asta ani porot korpachem patrak asta.

unnormalised: Repayment vixim, hangech vostu khorem zata. Tumi samanyatah loan fattim dinvchem mahinnea-chea installments-an, jem EMIs mhunnttaat. EMI amount loan amount, interest rate, ani loan tenure (kitlea velak tumi tem fattim dinvchem) ichea voilem nirbhar karta. Ek online EMI calculator vapraat tumi dor mahinnea-k kitlem dinvcheak padtolem tem zanna zaunk. Payment chuklean tumchem credit score seriously ding zaunk xakta, ani maka visvas asa, tumak to dukhdok naka. Banks aksher late payment-ak Rs. 500 sarkhi penalties dhartelem, mhunnttlear zai zalear payment prepone karaat.
normalised: Porot korpachem, hi zaga jiekitik zata. Tumhem sadaronnponnim loan mhoinyallea hishbean dil’lem asta, tem E-M-I mhonn zannam. E-M-I-chem mol loanancher adarun asta, vyajachea daranancher ani loanachea tenure-ant (kitlea vellak tum tem porot kortat). Ek online E-M-I calculator vaprat tum kitle poixe dor mhoinyanchea hishbean bhartolean tum zannounk. Chuklo zalear tumchea credit score-ak nuksaan povonk xakta, ani mhojeacher visvas dovorat, tem ek dukhdokh tumkam naka. Bankam khub pavtti rupi panch so late payment-achem penalty bhartat, tor zai zalear poilem bharaat.

unnormalised: Tumchea credit score-ak tumchem arthik report card mhunn chintat. Tem 300 than 900 poriant asta, ani ek boro score (750 vo vhoddlo) tumak loans ani credit cards mellovpak sope karta. Tumchea bills-ak vellanim dinvchem, tumchem credit utilization unnem dovrunk (tumchem cards max out korunk na!), ani ekach velak chodd loans-ak apply korunk avoid karaat. Ek unnem scoreacho arth asa loan nakarunk, vo ek chodd interest rate dinncheak padtata – zaise 12% 8% bodlek, aai!
normalised: Tumcho credit score tumchea arthik report card bhaxen vichar korat. Tem tinxe koddenlean novemxem poriant asta, ani ek boro score (sat so ani panchacher chodd) loan gheunk ani credit card gheunk sopeponn dita. Timcher bil bharaat vellar, tumchea credit-achem vapurni korop unnem dovorat (tumchea card-ank bharun dovorunk naka!), ani ekamekanchea sangata khub loanam korpak vochounk naka. Ek unnem score mhonnllear loan rediyeast zaunk poddta, vo khub uchch vyajachem dar bhartolem poddta - bareak tokke koddenlean bara tokke bhaxen bodlek, dukhdokh!

unnormalised: Prepayment tumcho ixtt! Tumchea kodde extra poisa asa zalea, tumchea loanachem ek bhag prepay korcheak vichar karaat. Hacho mhunnttlear principal amount unno zata ani tumi loanache jivit bharant kitlem interest dinvchem asa tem unnem zata. Kaim banks prepayment penalty dhartelem (kadchit tumi prepay kortalam tacho 2%), mhunnttlear poilem fine print check karaat.
normalised: Poilem porot mhonnllear tumcho ixtt! Tumchea kodden chodd poixe asat zalear, tumchea loanachem thoddem bhag poilem bharaat. Hem mulbhut mol ghoddotai ani tumchem total vyaj unnem kortai tum loan kitle vell boreak bhartoleant. Kainch bank poilem bhartoleak penalty bhartai (shokya asa don tokke tum kitle bharaat), tor lokx diiat.

unnormalised: Tumi dotted line-acher sign kortana, dogai conditions nittuch vachaat. Proshna suchaak naaka! Foreclosure charges, late payment penalties, ani kosle-i dusre clauses samzaat jemon tumaka line than affect korunk xakta. Hamesha borem surakshit asa duhkhasarpeksa, khas korun tumchea kharjin kamavlelea paisa babtin.
normalised: Tum sign korche poilem nem ani sharti lokxean vaprat. Question ulo korunko lazunk naka! Foreclosure charges, late payment penalty ani dusre clause somzonk gheiat jem tumkam dukh divnk xakta. Dor pavtti borek surkshit ravat dukhi zalean bodlek, mul’latvean tumchea khodden mell’lea poixea vixim.

unnormalised: Mhunnttlear, tumi techim asaat! Loans upyogi zaunk xakta, punn tanaka planning ani discipline chi garaz asta. Tumchem homework karaat, conditions samzaat, ani jababdaren loan ghevp karaat. Aata tumi vochaat ani tem sopnanchem ghor ghevpa vo tem family business vaddoounk. Good luck, bhai!
normalised: Tor tumchea kodden ek loan asta! Loan madad kortolem poddta, punn tankam yevzon ani shistichi goroz asta. Tumchem homework korat, nemam somzonk gheiat, ani zimmendarponnak zai titlech poixe gheiat. Atam vochat ani tumchea sopneachem ghor gheiat vo tumchea family-chea dhandeak dhako diiat. Borem naseeb, bhai!
